name: Change your image
description:
WARNING:  mentions of dysphoria and transphobia. Some jumpscares are here too.

You finally were able to prepare  the ritual   for your needs.  Time to get the perfect body! But will It allow you to achieve your dreams?

Note: I did not have time to add music for it. I hope you will enjoy thought!
Note2: I build  for Mac but I will be unable to test it. I hope you don't get any problem.
